review_data.title: Great, freshly made Food and good atmosphere
review_data.content: I eat in this restaurant on a regular basis. The food and variety is just great and you always have a choice of freshly made pasta dishes but also special meat dishes. If you are a non-smoker ask for this area. If you are a...More
